/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The street is devoid of any traffic or pedestrians, giving it a serene and peaceful ambiance. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The overall composition of the image provides a comprehensive view of the street, its surroundings, and the cityscape of Beijing.
